2 Reference¶

See 1   Usage as well.

2.1 norm_lens - Lensing normalization¶

tempura.norm_lens.qtt(lmax, rlmin, rlmax, fC, OCT, gtype='')[source]¶

Normalization of reconstructed CMB lensing potential and its curl mode from the temperature quadratic estimator

:param : lmax (int): Maximum multipole of output normalization spectrum :param : rlmin/rlmax (int): Minimum/Maximum multipole of CMB for reconstruction :param : fC [l] (double): Theory TT spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCT [l] (double): Observed TT spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax)

Args(optional):
gtype (str)

Type of output, i.e., convergence (gtype=’k’) or lensing potential (gtype=’’, default)

Returns

Ag [l] (double): CMB lensing potential normalization, with bounds (0:lmax) :Ac [l] (double): Curl mode (pseudo lensing potential) normalization, with bounds (0:lmax)

Usage:
Ag,Ac = tempura.norm_lens.qtt(lmax,rlmin,rlmax,fC,OCT,gtype)

tempura.norm_lens.qte(lmax, rlmin, rlmax, fC, OCT, OCE, gtype='')[source]¶

Normalization of reconstructed CMB lensing potential and its curl mode from the TE quadratic estimator

:param : lmax (int): Maximum multipole of output normalization spectrum :param : rlmin/rlmax (int): Minimum/Maximum multipole of CMB for reconstruction :param : fC [l] (double): Theory TE spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCT [l] (double): Observed TT spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCE [l] (double): Observed EE spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax)

Args(optional):
gtype (str)

Type of output, i.e., convergence (gtype=’k’) or lensing potential (gtype=’’, default)

Returns

Ag [l] (double): CMB lensing potential normalization, with bounds (0:lmax) :Ac [l] (double): Curl mode (pseudo lensing potential) normalization, with bounds (0:lmax)

Usage:
Ag,Ac = tempura.norm_lens.qte(lmax,rlmin,rlmax,fC,OCT,OCE,gtype)

tempura.norm_lens.qtb(lmax, rlmin, rlmax, fC, OCT, OCB, gtype='')[source]¶

Normalization of reconstructed CMB lensing potential and its curl mode from the TB quadratic estimator

:param : lmax (int): Maximum multipole of output normalization spectrum :param : rlmin/rlmax (int): Minimum/Maximum multipole of CMB for reconstruction :param : fC [l] (double): Theory TE spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCT [l] (double): Observed TT spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCB [l] (double): Observed BB spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax)

Args(optional):
gtype (str)

Type of output, i.e., convergence (gtype=’k’) or lensing potential (gtype=’’, default)

Returns

Ag [l] (double): CMB lensing potential normalization, with bounds (0:lmax) :Ac [l] (double): Curl mode (pseudo lensing potential) normalization, with bounds (0:lmax)

Usage:
Ag,Ac = tempura.norm_lens.qtb(lmax,rlmin,rlmax,fC,OCT,OCB,gtype)

tempura.norm_lens.qee(lmax, rlmin, rlmax, fC, OCE, gtype='')[source]¶

Normalization of reconstructed CMB lensing potential and its curl mode from the E-mode quadratic estimator

:param : lmax (int): Maximum multipole of output normalization spectrum :param : rlmin/rlmax (int): Minimum/Maximum multipole of CMB for reconstruction :param : fC [l] (double): Theory EE spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCE [l] (double): Observed EE spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax)

Args(optional):
gtype (str)

Type of output, i.e., convergence (gtype=’k’) or lensing potential (gtype=’’, default)

Returns

Ag [l] (double): CMB lensing potential normalization, with bounds (0:lmax) :Ac [l] (double): Curl mode (pseudo lensing potential) normalization, with bounds (0:lmax)

Usage:
Ag,Ac = tempura.norm_lens.qee(lmax,rlmin,rlmax,fC,OCE,gtype)

tempura.norm_lens.qeb(lmax, rlmin, rlmax, fC, OCE, OCB, gtype='')[source]¶

Normalization of reconstructed CMB lensing potential and its curl mode from the EB quadratic estimator

Type of output, i.e., convergence (gtype=’k’) or lensing potential (gtype=’’, default)

Returns

Ag [l] (double): CMB lensing potential normalization, with bounds (0:lmax) :Ac [l] (double): Curl mode (pseudo lensing potential) normalization, with bounds (0:lmax)

Usage:
Ag,Ac = tempura.norm_lens.qeb(lmax,rlmin,rlmax,fC,OCE,OCB,gtype)

Normalization of reconstructed CMB lensing potential and its curl mode from the B-mode quadratic estimator

:param : lmax (int): Maximum multipole of output normalization spectrum :param : rlmin/rlmax (int): Minimum/Maximum multipole of CMB for reconstruction :param : fC [l] (double): Theory BB spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCB [l] (double): Observed BB spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax)

tempura.norm_lens.qttte(lmax, rlmin, rlmax, fCTT, fCTE, OCT, OCE, OCTE, gtype='')[source]¶

Correlation between unnormalized TT and TE quadratic estimators

:param : lmax (int): Maximum multipole of output normalization spectrum :param : rlmin/rlmax (int): Minimum/Maximum multipole of CMB for reconstruction :param : fCTT [l] (double): Theory TT spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : fCTE [l] (double): Theory TE spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCT [l] (double): Observed TT spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCE [l] (double): Observed EE spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCTE [l] (double): Observed TE spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax)

Args(optional):
gtype (str)

Type of output, i.e., convergence (gtype=’k’) or lensing potential (gtype=’’, default)

Returns

Ig [l] (double): Correlation between lensing potential estimators, with bounds (0:lmax) :Ic [l] (double): Correlation between curl mode estimators, with bounds (0:lmax)

Usage:
Ig,Ic = tempura.norm_lens.qttte(lmax,rlmin,rlmax,fCTT,fCTE,OCT,OCE,OCTE,gtype)

tempura.norm_lens.qttee(lmax, rlmin, rlmax, fCTT, fCEE, OCT, OCE, OCTE, gtype='')[source]¶

Correlation between unnormalized TT and EE quadratic estimators

:param : lmax (int): Maximum multipole of output normalization spectrum :param : rlmin/rlmax (int): Minimum/Maximum multipole of CMB for reconstruction :param : fCTT [l] (double): Theory TT spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : fCEE [l] (double): Theory EE spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCT [l] (double): Observed TT spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCE [l] (double): Observed EE spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCTE [l] (double): Observed TE spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax)

Args(optional):
gtype (str)

Type of output, i.e., convergence (gtype=’k’) or lensing potential (gtype=’’, default)

Returns

Ig [l] (double): Correlation between lensing potential estimators, with bounds (0:lmax) :Ic [l] (double): Correlation between curl mode estimators, with bounds (0:lmax)

Usage:
Ig,Ic = tempura.norm_lens.qttee(lmax,rlmin,rlmax,fCTT,fCEE,OCT,OCE,OCTE,gtype)

tempura.norm_lens.qteee(lmax, rlmin, rlmax, fCEE, fCTE, OCT, OCE, OCTE, gtype='')[source]¶

gtype (str)

Usage:
Ig,Ic = tempura.norm_lens.qteee(lmax,rlmin,rlmax,fCEE,fCTE,OCT,OCE,OCTE,gtype)

tempura.norm_lens.qtbeb(lmax, rlmin, rlmax, fCEE, fCBB, fCTE, OCT, OCE, OCB, OCTE, gtype='')[source]¶

Correlation between unnormalized TB and EB quadratic estimators

:param : lmax (int): Maximum multipole of output normalization spectrum :param : rlmin/rlmax (int): Minimum/Maximum multipole of CMB for reconstruction :param : fCEE [l] (double): Theory EE spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : fCBB [l] (double): Theory BB spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCT [l] (double): Observed TT spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCE [l] (double): Observed EE spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCB [l] (double): Observed BB spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCTE [l] (double): Observed TE spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax)

Args(optional):
gtype (str)

Usage:
Ig,Ic = tempura.norm_lens.qtbeb(lmax,rlmin,rlmax,fCEE,fCBB,fCTE,OCT,OCE,OCB,OCTE,gtype)

tempura.norm_lens.qmv(lmax, QDO, Al, Il)[source]¶

Compute MV estimator normalization. Currently BB is ignored.

:param : lmax (int): Maximum multipole of the output power spectra :param : QDO[6] (bool): Specifying which estimators to be combined for the minimum variance estimator, with size (6). The oder is TT, TE, EE, TB, EB and BB. Currently, BB is always False :param : Al [5,l] (double): Normalizations of each estimator (TT, TE, EE, TB, EB). :param : Il [4,l] (double): Correlation between different estimators (TTxTE, TTxEE, TExEE, TBxEB).

Returns

MV [l] (double): Normalization of the MV estimator, with bounds (0:lmax) :Nl [6,l] (double): Weights for each estimator (TT, TE, EE, TB, EB, BB=0), with bounds (0:lmax)

Usage:
MV,Nl = tempura.norm_lens.qmv(lmax,QDO,Al,Il)

tempura.norm_lens.qall(QDO, lmax, rlmin, rlmax, fC, OC, gtype='')[source]¶

Compute MV estimator normalization. Currently BB is ignored.

:param : QDO[6] (bool): Specifying which estimators to be combined for the minimum variance estimator, with size (6). The oder is TT, TE, EE, TB, EB and BB. :param : lmax (int): Maximum multipole of the output power spectra :param : rlmin/rlmax (int): Minimum/Maximum multipole of CMB for reconstruction :param : fC/OC [l] (double): Theory/Observed CMB angular power spectra (TT, EE, BB, TE), with bounds (0:rlmax)

Args(optional):
gtype (str)

Type of output, i.e., convergence (gtype=’k’) or lensing potential (gtype=’’, default)

Returns

Ag [6,l] (double): Normalization of the TT, TE, EE, TB, EB, and MV estimators for lensing potential, with bounds (6,0:lmax) :Ac [6,l] (double): Same as Ag but for curl mode :Nlg [6,l] (double): Weights for TT, TE, EE, TB, EB, and BB (=0) estimators for lensing potential, with bounds (6,0:lmax) :Nlc [6,l] (double): Same as Nlg but for curl mode

Usage:
Ag,Ac,Nlg,Nlc = tempura.norm_lens.qall(QDO,lmax,rlmin,rlmax,fC,OC,gtype)

tempura.norm_lens.qeb_iter(lmax, elmax, rlmin, rlmax, dlmin, dlmax, CE, OCE, OCB, Cpp, iter=1, conv=1e-06)[source]¶

Normalization of reconstructed CMB lensing potential and its curl mode from the EB quadratic estimator

:param : lmax (int): Maximum multipole of output normalization :param : elmax (int): Maximum multipole of input EE spectra, CE and OCE :param : rlmin/rlmax (int): Minimum/Maximum multipole of CMB for reconstruction :param : dlmin/dlmax (int): Minimum/Maximum multipole of E mode and lensing potential for delensing :param : CE [l] (double): Theory EE angular power spectrum, with bounds (0:elmax) :param : OCE [l] (double): Observed EE spectrum, with bounds (0:elmax) :param : OCB [l] (double): Observed BB spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : Cpp [l] (double): Theory lensing potential spectrum, with bounds (0:dlmax)

Args(optional):
iter (int)

number of iteration, default to 1 (no iteration)

conv (double)

a parameter for convergence the iteration, default to 0.001

Returns

Ag [l] (double): CMB lensing potential normalization, with bounds (0:lmax) :Ac [l] (double): Curl mode (pseudo lensing potential) normalization, with bounds (0:lmax)

Usage:
Ag,Ac = tempura.norm_lens.qeb_iter(lmax,elmax,rlmin,rlmax,dlmin,dlmax,CE,OCE,OCB,Cpp,iter,conv)

tempura.norm_lens.ttt(lmax, rlmin, rlmax, fC, OCT, gtype='')[source]¶

Unnormalized response between lensing potential and amplitude modulation from the temperature quadratic estimator

:param : lmax (int): Maximum multipole of output normalization spectrum :param : rlmin/rlmax (int): Minimum/Maximum multipole of CMB for reconstruction :param : fC [l] (double): Theory TT spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCT [l] (double): Observed TT spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax)

Args(optional):
gtype (str)

Type of output, i.e., convergence (gtype=’k’) or lensing potential (gtype=’’, default)

Returns

Ag [l] (double): Cross normalization, with bounds (0:lmax)

Usage:
Ag = tempura.norm_lens.ttt(lmax,rlmin,rlmax,fC,OCT,gtype)

tempura.norm_lens.stt(lmax, rlmin, rlmax, fC, OCT, gtype='')[source]¶

Unnormalized response between lensing potential and poisson sources/inhomogeneous nosie with the temperature quadratic estimator

:param : lmax (int): Maximum multipole of output normalization spectrum :param : rlmin/rlmax (int): Minimum/Maximum multipole of CMB for reconstruction :param : fC [l] (double): Theory TT spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCT [l] (double): Observed TT spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax)

Args(optional):
gtype (str)

Type of output, i.e., convergence (gtype=’k’) or lensing potential (gtype=’’, default)

Returns

Ag [l] (double): Cross normalization, with bounds (0:lmax)

Usage:
Ag = tempura.norm_lens.stt(lmax,rlmin,rlmax,fC,OCT,gtype)

2.2 norm_src - Point source normalization¶

tempura.norm_src.qtt(lmax, rlmin, rlmax, OCT)[source]¶

Normalization of reconstructed src field from the temperature quadratic estimator

:param : lmax (int): Maximum multipole of output normalization spectrum :param : rlmin/rlmax (int): Minimum/Maximum multipole of CMB for reconstruction :param : fC [l] (double): Theory TT spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCT [l] (double): Observed TT spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax)

Returns

As [l] (double): src field normalization, with bounds (0:lmax)

Usage:
As = tempura.norm_src.qtt(lmax,rlmin,rlmax,OCT)

2.3 norm_rot - Rotation normalization¶

tempura.norm_rot.qtb(lmax, rlmin, rlmax, fC, OCT, OCB)[source]¶

Normalization of reconstructed pol. rot. angle from the TB quadratic estimator

:param : lmax (int): Maximum multipole of output normalization spectrum :param : rlmin/rlmax (int): Minimum/Maximum multipole of CMB for reconstruction :param : fC [l] (double): Theory TE spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCT [l] (double): Observed TT spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCB [l] (double): Observed BB spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax)

Returns

Aa [l] (double): Pol. rot. angle normalization, with bounds (0:lmax)

Usage:
Aa = tempura.norm_rot.qtb(lmax,rlmin,rlmax,fC,OCT,OCB)

tempura.norm_rot.qeb(lmax, rlmin, rlmax, EE, OCE, OCB, BB=None)[source]¶

Normalization of reconstructed pol. rot. angle from the EB quadratic estimator

:param : lmax (int): Maximum multipole of output normalization spectrum :param : rlmin/rlmax (int): Minimum/Maximum multipole of CMB for reconstruction :param : EE [l] (double): Theory EE spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCE [l] (double): Observed EE spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCB [l] (double): Observed BB spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax)

Args(optionals):
BB [l] (double)

Theory BB spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax)

Returns

Aa [l] (double): Pol. rot. angle normalization, with bounds (0:lmax)

Usage:
Aa = tempura.norm_rot.qeb(lmax,rlmin,rlmax,EE,OCE,OCB,BB)

tempura.norm_rot.teb(lmax, rlmin, rlmax, EE, EB, OCE, OCB, BB=None)[source]¶

Response of reconstructed pol. rot. angle to amplitude in the EB quadratic estimator

:param : lmax (int): Maximum multipole of output normalization spectrum :param : rlmin/rlmax (int): Minimum/Maximum multipole of CMB for reconstruction :param : EE [l] (double): Theory EE spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : EB [l] (double): Theory EB spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCE [l] (double): Observed EE spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCB [l] (double): Observed BB spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax)

Args(optionals):
BB [l] (double)

Theory BB spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax)

Returns

Aa [l] (double): Pol. rot. angle normalization, with bounds (0:lmax)

Usage:
Aa = tempura.norm_rot.teb(lmax,rlmin,rlmax,EE,EB,OCE,OCB,BB)

2.4 norm_tau - Tau normalization¶

tempura.norm_tau.qtt(lmax, rlmin, rlmax, fC, OCT)[source]¶

Normalization of reconstructed amplitude modulation from the temperature quadratic estimator

:param : lmax (int): Maximum multipole of output normalization spectrum :param : rlmin/rlmax (int): Minimum/Maximum multipole of CMB for reconstruction :param : fC [l] (double): Theory TT spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCT [l] (double): Observed TT spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax)

Returns

At [l] (double): tau normalization, with bounds (0:lmax)

Usage:
At = tempura.norm_tau.qtt(lmax,rlmin,rlmax,fC,OCT)

tempura.norm_tau.qeb(lmax, rlmin, rlmax, EE, OCE, OCB, BB=None)[source]¶

Normalization of reconstructed amplitude modulation from the EB quadratic estimator

:param : lmax (int): Maximum multipole of output normalization spectrum :param : rlmin/rlmax (int): Minimum/Maximum multipole of CMB for reconstruction :param : EE [l] (double): Theory EE spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCE [l] (double): Observed EE spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCB [l] (double): Observed BB spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax)

Args(optionals):
BB [l] (double)

Theory BB spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax)

Returns

At [l] (double): Amplitude modulation normalization, with bounds (0:lmax)

Usage:
At = tempura.norm_tau.qeb(lmax,rlmin,rlmax,EE,OCE,OCB,BB)

tempura.norm_tau.oeb(lmax, rlmin, rlmax, EB, OCE, OCB)[source]¶

Normalization of reconstructed amplitude from the EB quadratic estimator The kernels are the same as the rotation normalization but with a factor of 4.

:param : lmax (int): Maximum multipole of output normalization spectrum :param : rlmin/rlmax (int): Minimum/Maximum multipole of CMB for reconstruction :param : EB [l] (double): Theory EB spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCE [l] (double): Observed EE spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCB [l] (double): Observed BB spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax)

Returns

At [l] (double): Normalization, with bounds (0:lmax)

Usage:
At = tempura.norm_tau.oeb(lmax,rlmin,rlmax,EB,OCE,OCB)

tempura.norm_tau.stt(lmax, rlmin, rlmax, fC, OCT)[source]¶

Unnormalized response between patchy tau and poisson sources/inhomogeneous noise with the temperature quadratic estimator

:param : lmax (int): Maximum multipole of output normalization spectrum :param : rlmin/rlmax (int): Minimum/Maximum multipole of CMB for reconstruction :param : fC [l] (double): Theory TT spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax) :param : OCT [l] (double): Observed TT spectrum, with bounds (0:rlmax)

Returns

At [l] (double): tau normalization, with bounds (0:lmax)

Usage:
At = tempura.norm_tau.stt(lmax,rlmin,rlmax,fC,OCT)
